summary.name: Summary
summary.content: Project Manager with technical background in software engineering and extensive experience managing complex cross-functional initiatives and driving operational excellence in fast-paced tech environments. Skilled in hands-on technical work, AI workflows and prompting, CI/CD automation, and QA coordination, alongside process optimization and data-driven decision making.

items.name: JobLyst
items.description: Building a curated job discovery platform for Berlin tech companies, applying hands-on technical skills in automation, API integration, and both AI and no-code development:

items.summary: Owned internal tooling and delivery workflows during Adjust’s post-acquisition integration, enabling team autonomy and faster execution. Partnered with AppLovin’s California teams to align priorities, manage dependencies, and ensure operational consistency.
highlights: Led a platform migration that reduced release cycles by 90%, enabling faster product iteration and significantly improving time-to-market for new features.
Enabled 30+ global stakeholders through structured workflow design, documentation, and training; reducing operational bottlenecks and lowering dependency on engineering teams.
Created delivery visibility through tracking systems and dashboards that monitored sprint execution, team velocity, and blockers, facilitating proactive risk management and continuous improvement.
Implemented internal self-service tooling and automated workflows that reduced manual effort and significantly accelerated delivery cycles across teams.
Drove adoption of company-wide standards and governance frameworks (design system), improving consistency, reducing rework, and enabling faster delivery across distributed teams.
items.note: Note: After completing this role in December 2024, I took a structured career break to focus on German language acquisition (B1) and strategic career development.

items.summary: Drove technical delivery for Unbabel's AI translation platform, collaborating with engineering to improve system reliability, internal tooling, and operational workflows.
highlights: Delivered 10+ platform improvements that supported acquisition and retention systems, informed by experimentation, user insights, and validation across internal stakeholders.
Improved technical infrastructure and CI/CD workflows in partnership with engineering, leading to a 4× increase in deployment speed and smoother release cycles.
Built analytics foundations and dashboards using SQL to track operational metrics, enabling data-driven process improvements across teams

items.summary: Led growth initiatives and product development during rapid scaling, collaborating with engineering teams to build features and tools that drove 100%+ annual user growth through data-driven experimentation and 100+ user interviews.
